Bibliography¶

  7. ———. “The Murder Machine.” Accessed November 29, 2017. http://www.cym.ie/documents/themurdermachine.pdf.

  11. Walsh, Brendan. “‘Frankly and Robustly National’: Padraig Pearse, the Gaelic League and the Campaign for Irish at the National University.” Studies: An Irish Quarterly Review 103, no. 411 (2014): 318–30.
